snippet: The development group that offered to buy the financially struggling hospital in Cobble Hill, Brooklyn, played a similar, if truncated, role for a hospital in New Jersey.
abstract: Fortis Property Group, group that has emerged as a possible savior for financially struggling Long Island College Hospital, was expected to play a similar role for Bayonne Medical Center in New Jersey; developer met several times in 2007 with the mayor of Bayonne to discuss take over; deal never happened and creditors painted Fortis's interest as development play.

byline.contributor: Jack Begg and Alain Delaquérière contributed research.

lead_paragraph: The development group that offered to buy the financially struggling hospital in Cobble Hill, Brooklyn, played a similar, if truncated, role for a hospital in New Jersey.

headline.main: Bidder for Long Island College Hospital Has Checkered Record in Role of Rescuer
headline.print_headline: Bidder for Long Island College Hospital Has Checkered Record in Role of Rescuer
